channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- CodeColorer
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- CodeColorer

item.title: CVE-2023-2795|2023-06-27T13:17:25.903Z -- unknown -- codecolorer
item.description: The CodeColorer WordPress plugin before 0.10.1 does not sanitise and escape some of its settings, which could allow high privilege users such as admin to perform Stored Cross-Site Scripting attacks even when the unfiltered_html capability is disallowed (for example in multisite setup)
